CHOOSE.TITLE: De quoi avez-vous besoin?
CHOOSE.QUESTION: De quoi avez-vous besoin?
CHOOSE.MEDICINE: J’ai besoin d’un médecin ou d’un médicament
CHOOSE.TRANSPORT: J’ai besoin d’un bus, d’un train ou d’un taxi
CHOOSE.MEDICINE_ENGLISH: I need a doctor or medicine

BUY.TITLE: Que voulez-vous acheter?
BUY.QUESTION: Que voulez-vous acheter?
BUY.FOOD: Je voudrais acheter quelque chose à manger
BUY.ELSE: Je voudrais acheter quelque chose d’autre
BUY.QUESTION_ENGLISH: What would you like to buy?
BUY.FOOD_ENGLISH: I would like to buy food
BUY.CLOTHES_ENGLISH: I would like to buy clothes
BUY.ELSE_ENGLISH: I would like to buy something else

FOOD.HALAL: Je cherche un supermarché qui vend la nourriture halal
FOOD.HALAL_ENGLISH: I want to find a grocery store with halal food
FOOD.REGULAR_ENGLISH: I want to find a regular grocery store
FOOD.MARKET_ENGLISH: I want to find a market

PHARMACY.EMERGENCY_PHARMACY: J’ai besoin d’une pharmacie de garde

ELSE.RECREATION: Je cherche des possibilités de loisirs
ELSE.AUTHORITIES_ENGLISH: I need to go to the authorities
ELSE.RECREATION_ENGLISH: I would like to do something recreational

AUTHORITIES.FEDERAL_OFFICE: Il me faut aller à l’Office Fédéral des Migrations et des Réfugiés
AUTHORITIES.FEDERAL_OFFICE_ENGLISH: I need to go to the Federal Office for Migrants and Refugees
AUTHORITIES.POLICE_ENGLISH: I need to go to the police

RECREATION.PARK: Je voudrais aller dans un parc
RECREATION.PLAYGROUND: Je cherche un terrain de jeux
RECREATION.OFFERS_FOR_WOMEN: Je cherche des activités sportives seulement pour les femmes
RECREATION.GYM: Je cherche un club de fitness

RECREATION.PLAYGROUND_ENGLISH: I want to visit a playground
RECREATION.GYM_ENGLISH: I want to go to a gym

RELIGION.MOSQUE_ENGLISH: I am looking for a mosque
